name: Pot-hole Pete
description:
a game inspired by real life pot-holes

Jump into the world of Pot-hole Pete, a man so frustrated by terrible roads, that he lives only to make the driving conditions around him slightly better.

Fill pot-holes, dodge cars, adhere to traffic lights (if you want)

please send all feedback, ideas, and insults to hello@robbieoliver.com

thank-you for visiting, and enjoy the game
